summary: Innovative executive operations director with proven success in capital project delivery, pipeline operations, safety and reliability, budgeting, and organizational change. Experienced in leading cross-functional teams, expanding capacity, and delivering projects on time and on budget.

experience.title: Director of Pipeline Operations
experience.description: Led reorganized processes across gas control, engineering and design, project management, pipeline and compression systems, integrity management, and facility optimization; directed procurement of indirect employees and contractors; ensured safety, compliance, reliability, and cost control; built and operated new interconnects and expansion compressor stations; developed budgeting processes and five-year plan; improved project budget success rate to over 95%.

experience.title: Senior Project Manager
experience.description: Led development of project management team; identified and managed engineering and construction projects from conception to closeout; introduced comprehensive Business Development plan and client relationships; negotiated with confidential clients through permitting processes.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Provided senior-level leadership for all construction phases; coordinated contractors, materials and scheduling; oversaw design drawings and contract administration; delivered two expansion compressor stations and related facilities on time and on budget; managed safety and environmental compliance.

experience.title: Engineering, Operations and Construction Leader
experience.description: Led multiple roles: Construction Lead, Damage Prevention Leader, and Supervisor of Engineering; reduced locator error to 0% for multiple years; streamlined customer installation processes cutting time from inquiry to meter turn-on from 68 to 31 days; developed estimating tools to streamline costs; led safety and risk management initiatives.

education.degree: Graduate Level Certificate, Negotiation and Conflict Resolution
Master of Education (M.Ed.), Integrated Studies and Management
Design Technology - Architectural and Civil Design Technology Certificate
